<template>  
<!-- 翻转卡片示例 -->
<div class="flip-card-section">
  <h3 class="section-title">景点推荐</h3>
  <div class="flip-cards-container">
    <div class="flip-card" @click="flipCard('card1')">
      <div class="flip-card-inner" :class="{ 'flipped': flippedCards.card1 }">
        <!-- 正面 -->
        <div class="flip-card-front">
          <div class="card-image">
            <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506905925346-21bda4d32df4?w=300&h=200&fit=crop" alt="山景" />
          </div>
          <div class="card-content">
            <h4 class="card-title">美丽山景</h4>
            <p class="card-subtitle">自然风光</p>
            <div class="card-rating">
              <span class="stars">★★★★★</span>
              <span class="rating-text">4.8分</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!-- 背面 -->
        <div class="flip-card-back">
          <div class="back-content">
            <h4 class="back-title">景点详情</h4>
            <p class="back-description">
              这里有壮丽的山峰和清澈的湖水，是户外运动爱好者的天堂。
              提供徒步、攀岩、划船等多种活动项目。
            </p>
            <div class="back-info">
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">开放时间：</span>
                <span class="info-value">8:00-18:00</span>
              </div>
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">门票价格：</span>
                <span class="info-value">¥80/人</span>
              </div>
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">推荐游玩：</span>
                <span class="info-value">3-4小时</span>
              </div>
            </div>
            <button class="back-button">查看详情</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="flip-card" @click="flipCard('card2')">
      <div class="flip-card-inner" :class="{ 'flipped': flippedCards.card2 }">
        <!-- 正面 -->
        <div class="flip-card-front">
          <div class="card-image">
            <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441974231531-c6227db76b6e?w=300&h=200&fit=crop" alt="森林" />
          </div>
          <div class="card-content">
            <h4 class="card-title">神秘森林</h4>
            <p class="card-subtitle">探险体验</p>
            <div class="card-rating">
              <span class="stars">★★★★☆</span>
              <span class="rating-text">4.5分</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!-- 背面 -->
        <div class="flip-card-back">
          <div class="back-content">
            <h4 class="back-title">森林探险</h4>
            <p class="back-description">
              原始森林中隐藏着无数秘密，古老的树木和丰富的野生动物
              等待着勇敢的探险者来发现。
            </p>
            <div class="back-info">
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">开放时间：</span>
                <span class="info-value">9:00-17:00</span>
              </div>
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">门票价格：</span>
                <span class="info-value">¥120/人</span>
              </div>
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">推荐游玩：</span>
                <span class="info-value">半天</span>
              </div>
            </div>
            <button class="back-button">立即预订</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="flip-card" @click="flipCard('card3')">
      <div class="flip-card-inner" :class="{ 'flipped': flippedCards.card3 }">
        <!-- 正面 -->
        <div class="flip-card-front">
          <div class="card-image">
            <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1439066615861-d1af74d74000?w=300&h=200&fit=crop" alt="湖泊" />
          </div>
          <div class="card-content">
            <h4 class="card-title">宁静湖泊</h4>
            <p class="card-subtitle">休闲度假</p>
            <div class="card-rating">
              <span class="stars">★★★★★</span>
              <span class="rating-text">4.9分</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!-- 背面 -->
        <div class="flip-card-back">
          <div class="back-content">
            <h4 class="back-title">湖光山色</h4>
            <p class="back-description">
              碧波荡漾的湖水倒映着远山，是放松心情、享受宁静的
              绝佳去处。可以垂钓、划船或湖边漫步。
            </p>
            <div class="back-info">
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">开放时间：</span>
                <span class="info-value">全天开放</span>
              </div>
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">门票价格：</span>
                <span class="info-value">免费</span>
              </div>
              <div class="info-item">
                <span class="info-label">推荐游玩：</span>
                <span class="info-value">2-3小时</span>
              </div>
            </div>
            <button class="back-button">获取路线</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
  import { ref } from "vue"
  
  // 翻转卡片状态
  const flippedCards = ref({
    card1: false,
    card2: false,
    card3: false
  })

  // 翻转卡片方法
  const flipCard = (cardId: string) => {
    flippedCards.value[cardId] = !flippedCards.value[cardId]
  }
</script>

<style scoped lang="less">

  // 翻转卡片样式
  .flip-card-section {
    margin: 30px 0;

    .section-title {
      font-size: 24px;
      font-weight: 600;
      color: #333;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      text-align: center;
    }

    .flip-cards-container {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
      gap: 20px;
      max-width: 1200px;
      margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .flip-card {
      background-color: transparent;
      width: 100%;
      height: 400px;
      perspective: 1000px;
      cursor: pointer;

      .flip-card-inner {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        text-align: center;
        transition: transform 0.8s;
        transform-style: preserve-3d;

        &.flipped {
          transform: rotateY(180deg);
        }
      }

      .flip-card-front,
      .flip-card-back {
        position: absolute;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        backface-visibility: hidden;
        border-radius: 16px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .flip-card-front {
        background: white;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;

        .card-image {
          height: 200px;
          overflow: hidden;

          img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
          }
        }

        .card-content {
          padding: 20px;
          flex: 1;
          display: flex;
          flex-direction: column;
          justify-content: space-between;

          .card-title {
            font-size: 20px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #333;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
          }

          .card-subtitle {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #666;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
          }

          .card-rating {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 8px;

            .stars {
              color: #ffd700;
              font-size: 16px;
            }

            .rating-text {
              color: #666;
              font-size: 14px;
            }
          }
        }

        &:hover {
          .card-image img {
            transform: scale(1.05);
          }
        }
      }

      .flip-card-back {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
        color: white;
        transform: rotateY(180deg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;

        .back-content {
          padding: 30px;
          text-align: left;
          width: 100%;

          .back-title {
            font-size: 22px;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
            text-align: center;
          }

          .back-description {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            opacity: 0.9;
          }

          .back-info {
            margin-bottom: 24px;

            .info-item {
              display: flex;
              justify-content: space-between;
              margin-bottom: 8px;
              font-size: 14px;

              .info-label {
                opacity: 0.8;
              }

              .info-value {
                font-weight: 500;
              }
            }
          }

          .back-button {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 12px 24px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 500;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;

            &:hover {
              background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
              border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
              transform: translateY(-2px);
            }
          }
        }
      }

      // 不同卡片的背景渐变
      &:nth-child(2) .flip-card-back {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%);
      }

      &:nth-child(3) .flip-card-back {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%);
      }
    }
  }
</style>
